segments.text: Nathan said he didn't have any fun at his new school this week . Do you know why ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think he hasn't made any new friends yet . He's just a little lonely .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: He really misses his friends from our old neighborhood .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Without a doubt . Maybe if he knew he doesn't have to give up any of his old friends to make new ones , it will be easier for him .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How do you propose to help him understand that ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , we can help him keep in touch with his old friends .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I guess we could go visit once in a while too .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah . There's a lot we can do to help him through this transition .
segments.speaker: S2
